name: Text Extractor
desc: Text Extractor: Smart Fill - Machine Learning Framework: Designed a Machine Learning framework that uses the OCR technique to extract text from documents and autofill web application forms using powerful tools like Azure, Dot Net, RESTful API, SQL, and React

name: IDS on the IoV's
desc: IDS on The Internet of Vehicles: Developed an IDS device using ML algorithms (XGBoost, AdaBoost, Gradient Boost, LightGBM, CatBoost

name: VoIP Application
desc: Voice Over Internet Protocol (VoIP) Application: Developed a web app using the MERN stack that allowed university professors to connect, schedule meetings, and manage student records.

name: Face-Recogination-App
desc: Face-Recogination-Attendance-App: Developed an advanced attendance system using facial recognition to streamline the attendance process for the university, eliminating inefficiencies of traditional methods like biometrics and RFID.

name: Instagram MERN
desc: Full-Stack Instagram clone built using MERN stack and realtime chat with the help of socket.iO

name: Flipkart MERN
desc: Full-Stack Flipkart with Admin Dashboard and Paytm Payment Gateway. MERN Stack WebApp, ready to use for business.
